title: Chat client not working.  Attempting to reconnect...(Colorado)
body: I'm in the Denver area with comcast and from what i've read from about half a year ago in the Houston area, they were having the same problem.  So is this more so a comcast problem?  Is there anything I should do or is it just a waiting game?

replies.body: Can you see if this is working now?
Also in Utah. Comcast as well. Chat is down.
Oh god im in Utah and have comcast. how does the internet provider mess with chat? like I dont understand but this doesnt seem like a concidence
